title: LoL screensaver
body: I unninstall LoL screensaver but screensaver delete my LoL please FIX this

replies.body: That's a strange situation, I've never heard of uninstalling the screensaver removing the game as well.  If the uninstall was manual, it's possible that game files may have accidentally been deleted.  You can download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help restore your client to a fresh state.  Hope that helps!
Nothing much to fix - you just need to install LoL again. When you installed the screensaver, it installed inside the LoL folder, I'm pretty sure.
